wikipedia_page.main: Richard Robinson (born 1953 in Halifax, West Riding of Yorkshire, England) is an actor, writer and puppeteer. He is also the Director of the Brighton Science Festival.

response: *Richard Robinson (Municipal Reform politician) (1849–1928), English politician and chemist
*Richard Robinson (chess player) (1956-2009), American and Bermudian chess player
*Richard Robinson (chief executive) (1937–2021), American chief executive officer of Scholastic Corporation
*Richard Robinson (festival director) (born 1953), puppeteer based in the UK
